title: Complete  Footstep Soundpack
description: Put your best FOOT forward and TOE-tally nail your project's SFX needs with this Footstep Sound Pack!
longDescription:
Thank you for supporting!

short demo: here

Soundlist: here


This is the most comprehensive foot sound selection on the marketplace!


751- 24 bit/44.1 kHz Mono Footstep SFX with footsteps for Barefoot, Boots, Sneakers, High Heels, Leather Shoes, Running Shoes, Shoes, Socks, and Stilettos! 75 Jump Landings and 6 wading water SFX too! Each foot type has a soft and loud variant with 5 different variations for each surface type, and even some foot strike variations!


These are NOT just recordings or raw SFX! Each footstep has volume, pitch, or sample variation and post audio production techniques applied to the audio, giving you the best sounding sounds and bang for your buck!
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  751 24 bit/44.1 kHz MONO SFX
  •  Footwear: barefoot, boots, sneakers, high heels, leather shoes, running shoes, shoes, socks, and stillettos
  •  jump landings and wading water sounds
  • wide assortment of surfaces including carpet, hollow wood, solid wood, metal, grass, gravel, concrete, and more!
  • different foot strikes such as forefoot and heel-to-toe


Number of Audio Waves: 751

Number of Audio Cues: 751

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1/24 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 12.5

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: YES

Mac: YES

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation
